DOC.brief_summary: To test the efficacy of Gudness Bars in improving the hemoglobin and hematocrit levels of anemic subjects longitudinally. To quantify the demographics of subjects attending anemia testing camps through LBWR and to explore correlations with the demographics data.
DOC.brief_title: Let's be Well Red: Efficacy of Gudness Bars in Improving the Hemoglobin and Hematocrit Levels of Anemic Subjects
DOC.criteria: Female Ages 1835 years age Known allergy towards nuts.
